definition: to settle down/to set up a home
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]
to make one's home in a place/to settle
stable household, established profession (idiom); settled and comfortably off

sentences.chinese: 你能在这里安家落户吗？

sentences.english: Thousands of militants traded in guns for stipends and training.
sentences.chinese: 成千上万的武装分子开始接受培训并领取安家费。

sentences.english: Now it is finding a home in China.
sentences.chinese: 于国外，现在沙画在中国安家落户。

sentences.english: Provide an apartment and family allowance during the period of working.
sentences.chinese: 工作期间提供公寓式住房一套和安家费。
他们已经在海南岛安家落户。

sentences.english: A house in filial piety is Lord of as vice President, in elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 在孝是安家的一家之主，在小学担任副校长。

sentences.english: The state shall encourage veteran cadres to settle in the countryside or in small or medium-sized cities or towns.
sentences.chinese: 国家鼓励离休干部到农村或中小城镇安家落户。

sentences.english: Do I have to transfer my settlement funds to New Zealand?
sentences.chinese: 我必须把我的安家费转移到新西兰吗？

sentences.english: He has determined to settle down in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 他决定在农村安家落户。

sentences.english: We are focused on providing the expatriate community with the highest standards of relocation service.
sentences.chinese: 志盟置业是专为青岛的外籍人士提供专业的安家服务。

sentences.english: Our men some of them-might even settle here.
sentences.chinese: 我们之中有几个人很想在这里安家。

sentences.english: All the families got the settling-in allowance from the government.
sentences.chinese: 所有家庭都得到了政府的安家费。

sentences.english: Sparrow, build your home in the belly of the beast.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀啊，在野兽的腹中安家吧。

sentences.english: This wife brought two daughters into the house with her.
sentences.chinese: 新妻子带着她以前生的两个女儿一起来安家了。

sentences.english: We'll go and settle down where conditions are hardest.
Does the idea of making a home in a foreign destination sound crazy? Or awesome?
sentences.chinese: 在一个陌生的地方再次安家，是疯狂还是酷毙了？

definition: to make one's home in a place/to settle
stable household, established profession (idiom); settled and comfortably off
to settle (in some city, country etc)/to take up residence
Anju district of Suining city 遂寧市|遂宁市[Sui4 ning2 shi4], Sichuan
to settle down/to live peacefully
to stay for a time/to stop over/to lodge/to sink down (into soft ground)/leftovers
to make one's home/to take shelter
to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
to stay at/to live in (temporarily)
to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
the whole family
to settle down and get married (of a man)/to become a recognized expert
comfortable niche
to migrate/to move to a new place of residence
residence
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
a stranger/out-of-towner
